survey_name: AI-Powered Virtual Meeting Assistant User Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate user experience and satisfaction with AI-powered virtual meeting assistants in professional settings.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use an AI-powered virtual meeting assistant?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use an AI-powered virtual meeting assistant?

questions.question_text: Which features of the AI virtual meeting assistant do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Consider randomizing option order to avoid bias.

script.question_text: Which features of the AI virtual meeting assistant do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: How would you rate the accuracy of the AI virtual meeting assistant's transcriptions?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for nuanced feedback. Include N/A option for users who haven't used the feature.

script.question_text: How would you rate the accuracy of the AI virtual meeting assistant's transcriptions?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for AI virtual meeting assistants?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Provide a text box with ample space for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for AI virtual meeting assistants?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: How has using an AI virtual meeting assistant impacted your meeting productivity?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced scale to measure both positive and negative impacts. Single-choice format recommended.
